Creator: John Savelid
Heading: Great interest for our skating tours
Text: Most weekends are almost fully booked already, but we do have some vacancies. And we can also offer skating tours during the first half of the week - Monday until Wednesday.

Creator: John Savelid
Heading: A great day for skating - see the movie
Text: November have been a great month for skating, good black ice everywhere, low temperatures and no snow. We have a got a lot of days on the ice, a perfect start of the skating season

Creator: John Savelid
Heading: First day on ice!!
Text: Our favourite season, finally there is ice again, a small area, and foggy. But we can skate, it's beautiful and the ice is perfect!.
